WorkItem.Description: It would be a great feature for "large base code", to be able to mimic full oop member access paradigms from "advanced" languages...

Comments.Message:
Thanks.  Protected & Private treatment are areas we are aware of requests for, and we discuss often.  Currently the implementation is as designed.  Unless you are aware of any issues with the current implementation, I will close this out from the 'issue tracker' area.
 
Feel free to open in the language discussion area if you have any specific input on protected design.  But rest assured, we are aware of the request :-)
